title: Soukou Kyojin Z-Knight
synopsis: A promotional video tape with a short Z-Knight anime and other clips sold with a Z-Knight douple pack including colour variations of two Z-Knights.
staff: [['Uchida, Kenji', ['Producer']], ['Takayama, Fumihiko', ['Director', ' Series Composition']], ['Anno, Hideaki', ['Key Animation']], ['Takeda, Yuusuke', ['Art Director']]]
